message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item at a fair price. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on this product. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was hoping to get a bit closer to the value I have in mind. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1050000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your perspective and am willing to consider a price closer to my budget. I propose a price of $1000000 for the product.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm glad we're getting closer to a mutually agreeable price. However, I still need to ensure I get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I'd like to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'm willing to include a 5-year warranty and a dedicated support package. I'm still firm at $1050000, but I think these extras make it a more compelling offer.

Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate the additional value you're offering. I would like to propose a price of $1000000 for the product, without any additional extras. This aligns better with my budget while still allowing me to benefit from your generous offer.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to compromise on the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1025000, but I'm not including any extras this time. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $800000, and I'm already giving you a significant discount.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a final price of $1000000 for the product.

Bob, I've made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $1025000. I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one final offer: $1025000, and I'm throwing in a 3-year maintenance package to sweeten the deal. This is my last offer, and I expect you to accept it.

Alice, thank you for your final offer and the additional maintenance package. I appreciate the effort. However, I must respectfully decline the offer at $1025000. I am unable to move beyond my maximum budget of $1000000. I will proceed to purchase the product from John for $800000.
